channel.title: My server keeps crashing! Please help.! (PKOWNSCAPE)
channel.description:
ok well i start my server, then after about 5 minutes, this will come up on the run.bat file.. [code] at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) at player.postprocessing(player.java:1081) [/code]
And it keeps on doing that is there any way I can fix this? Thanks!

item.title: My server keeps crashing! Please help.! (PKOWNSCAPE)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.source: My server keeps crashing! Please help.! (PKOWNSCAPE)

item.title: My server keeps crashing! Please help.! (PKOWNSCAPE)
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:3, topic:167585”]I say owned.

The error comes because too much players are logging in the server, while the maxPlayers are lower. Change it to something like 50, or 30.[/quote]
Where do I do that?

Read full topic
